name: Senioritis (ScaryGnomeStudios, Tamsen Reed)
description:
Senioritis is a dating sim-type game that focuses on companionship. With 12 different companions and mini-games (coming soon!), this wholesome experience deals with a multitude of problems from toxic masculinity to ageism, self-acceptance, and homophobia.

You play as Travis, a member of the Gamma Alpha Rho fraternity. In order to fulfill your philanthropic requirements, you volunteer at a local nursing home.  You can befriend a variety of different old women. If you have a passion for root vegetables and communism, you may find kinship with Katja. If you prefer to spend your time revving engines and sticking it to the proverbial man, Pearl may be more your speed. Run lines and relive the glory days with Abigail, an aging actress who is always willing to be the life of the party. 

Also among the cast of characters you can spend time with are your frat brothers. You might find yourself canoodling with Keith if you enjoy the simple country life. If when you say "Lit," it's short for "Literature," you may see a future with Vinnie. Chad could be your man, but only if you prove yourself in the gym first!
